function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Proactive agile development of the covid-19 dashboard without proper planning may result in incomplete or inaccurate data representation.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Abnormal concentrations of traffic outside supermarkets and health-care facilities.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Capture of changing patterns of traffic, pedestrian, and other activity away from the city centre.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduction in air pollution and improvement in environmental indices such as nitrogen dioxide.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of data integration for specific covid-19 impacts","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid development of dashboard","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Observing social change without clear action plan","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Large-scale real-time data capture infrastructure may pose privacy risks if data is not anonymized effectively.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close collaboration with local authorities and citizen partners may increase the risk of disease transmission if proper health and safety measures are not followed.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Publication of real-time urban movement data and covid-19 dashboard may lead to public panic or misinformation if not presented and interpreted accurately.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Neoliberal surveillance mechanism through big data","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 crisis management using iot and smart city data","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased risk of covid-19 transmission in the workplace due to close interaction among workforce, design team, contractors, clients, stakeholders, and supply chain.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Short-term cash flow issues due to economic lockdown and reduced business activities.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty in the business return plan due to evolving covid-19 situation and economic consequences.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of cross-sector collaboration","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of crisis management skills","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of crisis-response leadership programs","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Resistance to cultural change","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential delay of infrastructure projects","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited generalizability of research results","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of communication and employee well-being considerations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on infrastructure projects and staff members","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Difficulty conducting drugs and alcohol tests for new staff","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Prevalence of covid-19 in the built environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential economic collapse","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unanimous implementation of solutions not achieved in organisations a and c","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limited work from home periods for employees during lockdown","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of preparedness for unexpected outbreaks such as covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Construction workers being exposed to the virus due to close contact and shared workspaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited availability of virus testing for workers within the uk","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Challenges in adjusting commercial terms and place of work requirements to comply with safety obligations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential transmission of covid-19 from suppliers delivering materials to construction sites.","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Reduced workforce on site may impact the ability to deliver projects as promised, leading to potential delays and client dissatisfaction.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of social distancing in site offices and vans","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased use of technology and mobile phones for remote work","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in supply chain and accommodation provision for construction workers","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Hiring new staff members during a pandemic without in-person interviews and induction process.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased reliance on digital tools and remote work may lead to decreased attention to health and safety protocols on site, increasing the risk of disease transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Integration of new staff into the organization may pose a risk of disease transmission if proper onboarding protocols are not in place","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased reliance on digital modeling and visualization tools may lead to decreased physical collaboration, potentially hindering effective problem-solving and communication","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Delays in project completion due to lockdown and high-risk personnel","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Communication challenges between off-site manager and on-site team","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on digital tools for construction coordination","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Site engineers and surveyors forced to work from home due to covid-19 lockdown rules","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Difficulty in providing required services due to high-risk personnel unable to conduct on-site work","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High-risk personnel unwilling to risk their health to conduct critical surveying tasks on-site","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Difficulty in managing project teams due to remote work","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inability to conduct site investigations and health inspections","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Threats to data validity due to remote data collection","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"}]}
